Barnacled Buckler
  • +7 Enhancement Bonus+7 Enhancement Bonus: +7 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Riposte VIIIRiposte VIII: When missed in Melee: Deals 8 to 32 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +4 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws..
  • Inherent Elemental Resistance - 10Inherent Elemental Resistance - 10: This item provides a +10 Insight bonus to your Acid, Cold, Fire, and Electrical resistances.
  • Corrosive Salt GuardCorrosive Salt Guard: This item stores a caustic, insatiable power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power can come to the surface in the form of a noxious, corrosive salt that dissolves all substances.
  • Vulnerability GuardVulnerability Guard: This item stores powerful erosive forces. When the wearer is missed in combat, this power occasionally releases a degrading blast, adding three stacks of vulnerability to all enemies nearby.
  • Sheltering +12 Sheltering +12: +12 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings
  • Empty Purple Augment Slot Red Augments
    • Damage per ML: Ruby Eye augments, Meteoric Star Ruby, etc.
    • DR bypass: Alignment, Material
    • Deconstructor
    • Elemental damage: +1 to +2d6
    • Ruby of Ghostbane
    • Ruby of the Endless Night
    • Ruby of the Vampire Slayer
    • Spell Power (Enhancement bonus): +30 to +138
    Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Golem's Heart
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +5 to +40
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +2 to +16
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8

    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift

Buckler of the Celestial Soldier
  • +14 Enhancement Bonus+14 Enhancement Bonus: +14 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Quality Dexterity +4Quality Dexterity +4: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +4 quality bonus to Dexterity.
  • Quality Magical Sheltering +12Quality Magical Sheltering +12: +12 Quality bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
  • Quality Physical Sheltering +12Quality Physical Sheltering +12: +12 Quality bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Empty Red Augment Slot Red Augments

Buckler of the Demonic Soldier
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Dazing IVDazing IV: On Hit: Your target suffers a -1 Penalty to Will Saving Throws for 6 seconds. This effect sacks up to 5 times. This effect may only occur on-hit once every three seconds.
    Passive: The DC of the saving throw to resist your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist combat feats is increased by 8.
  • Impact IIIImpact III: Passive: This weapon deals an additional +1[W] damage. In addition, the base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with Improved Critical feat.
  • Sheltering +3 Sheltering +3: +3 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings

Crabshell Buckler
  • +4 Enhancement Bonus+4 Enhancement Bonus: +4 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Chitinous Covering: Fire Absorption 19%Fire Absorption 19%: Passive: 19% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Natural Armor +5Natural Armor +5: Passive: +5 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.
  • Immunity to Slippery SurfacesImmunity to Slippery Surfaces: The wearer of this item is not affected when walking on slippery surfaces.
  • GuardbreakingGuardbreaking: This item enables you to break an enemy's guard in between your melee attacks. On critical hits with your melee weapons, enemies will become dazed as a result.
  • Empty Orange Augment Slot Orange Augments

Epic Spectre Deflector (level 20)
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Protection from EvilProtection from Evil: Passive: You gain the benefit of the spell Protection from Evil.
  • Ghostbane 4Ghostbane 4: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt the risen dead, dealing an additional 4d10 bane damage vs. Undead monsters.
    Passive: This weapon has Ghost Touch, and bypasses ethereal monster's 50% chance to evade bane damage.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Lifesealed +27Lifesealed +27: You are immune to magical effects that cause instant death. In addition, you have a +27 enhancement bonus to Negative Energy Absorption.
  • Empty Blue Augment Slot Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

Epic Swashbuckler (tier 1)(level 20)
  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
    • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
    • Parrying IVParrying IV: Passive: +2 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +2 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving throws.
    • Doublestrike 6% Doublestrike 6%: Passive: 6% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
    • GuardbreakingGuardbreaking: This item enables you to break an enemy's guard in between your melee attacks. On critical hits with your melee weapons, enemies will become dazed as a result.
    • RiposteRiposte: When its wearer is successfully attacked in melee, this shield occasionally allows him or her to make an immediate counterattack, dealing bludgeoning damage to the offending enemy.
  • Upgradeable - Tier 2
    • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls. becomes +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
    • Shield Bonus: +7 becomes Shield Bonus: +8
    • Damage Reduction: 9 becomes Damage Reduction: 10
    • Parrying IVParrying IV: Passive: +2 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +2 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving throws. becomes Parrying VIIIParrying VIII: Passive: +4 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +4 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving throws.
  • Upgradeable - Tier 3
    • Adds Insightful Dexterity +2Insightful Dexterity +2: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +2 insight bonus to Dexterity.
    • Adds Empty Blue Augment Slot Blue Augments

Epic Swashbuckler (tier 1)(level 24)
  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
    • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.

Van Richten's Cane
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Stunning +6 Stunning +6: +6 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Riposte +2Riposte +2: +2 Insight bonus to Armor Class and to Saves
  • Shield Bashing +9Shield Bashing +9: +9 Enhancement bonus to Increased chance of Secondary Shield Bash.
  • Undead BaneUndead Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Undeads, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +2 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against the foe.
  • SilverSilver: A complex process involving metallurgy and alchemy can bond silver to a weapon made of steel so that it bypasses the damage reduction of creatures such as devils and vampires.
    Silver weapons have 2 points lower hardness then equivalent steel weapons, and as such aren't quite as durable.    , Alchemical
  • Empty Orange Augment Slot Orange Augments
    • Meridian Fragment
    Yellow Augments
    • Deathblock
    • Draconic Soul Gem
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +40
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +5% to +30%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +10 to +250
    Red Augments
    • Damage per ML: Ruby Eye augments, Meteoric Star Ruby, etc.
    • DR bypass: Alignment, Material
    • Deconstructor
    • Elemental damage: +1 to +2d6
    • Ruby of Ghostbane
    • Ruby of the Endless Night
    • Ruby of the Vampire Slayer
    • Spell Power (Enhancement bonus): +30 to +138
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15
  • Adherent of the Mists Set (Heroic)Adherent of the Mists Set (Heroic): 5 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Profane bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
    +10 Profane bonus to Positive, Negative, and Repair Amplification
    +5 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
